Description: Use this to make ores go places!
Use this to sell ores!
This is the first mine! Drops 1 ore worth $2 every second!
A nice bench to put in your base where you can sit and relax.
The stronger variant of the ruby mine, the sapphire mine drops sapphire ores worth $50
This special machine harvests a rare ore known as masterium which sells for $5K.
The almighty diamond mine is truly a step up from the emerald mine. Drops $100 ores every 2 seconds.
The glorious ruby mine pumps out ruby ore worth $30.
A jade green mine which pumps out emerald ore, the ore is worth $75.
This conveyor has the ability to move ores at very fast speeds.
Powering this conveyor with gas made it an affordable fast conveyor.
A magical conveyor where with the press of a button your ores go another way. WOW!
This conveyor centers ores! Not much else to be said about it.
This item lights up a huge area.
A bush that defies logic since it can survive regardless of where it's placed.
This floodlight can be used to light up a large area of your base at night, can be raised to provide light at a greater height.
A crystal that can become 1 of 10 colours when placed.
This wall is here to help you keep anyone out!
It's a door made of concrete
A nice floorboard to decorate your base
This wall is here to help you keep anyone out!
This item will help light up your base at night.
Helps you get to around your setup.
This conveyor centers ores at various elevations.
Use this to make ores go places, now at greater heights!
This item is used to elevate your ores to hydraulic conveyors
This item helps you climb up to your setup. It can also be placed on platforms for climbing up them
Use this to safely transport ores down from heights.
A Basic Potted Tree. Someday This Will Grow To Be A Big Tree.
A useless pot of dirt.
This item will help light up your base at night to a greater extent than the smaller light.
A small wall that can stop ores from falling off conveyors.
These trees cost a million because they are hard to dig up and keep alive.
A more advanced version of the iron mine. Extracts the same ores as the basic iron mine but faster.
This mine extracts silver from the ground. It's worth $3 and can be extracted slightly faster than the basic iron mine.
While being much bigger than most mines, the gold mine extracts valuable gold ores worth $15. However, it takes slightly longer to extract and the ores are slightly bigger.
Ores from this mine cost twice as much as regular iron ores and drops 3 at once but takes much longer to extract.
This marvellous machine creates ores worth $120 and is super small!
This simple upgrader adds $1 to ore value with no limit.
This mine produces valuable amethyst ores that are worth $200.
This is a drill, it is capable of extracting ore much faster. This ores, known as darkite, sells for $300!
Gathers energy from a small powerful core to create a godly ore that can be sold for a thousand dollars! WOW
This machine extracts antimatter from the depths of space and somehow makes it safe to sell. Sells for $15K.
An upgraded basic furnace that can process ores for anywhere between 1-3 times
Some trash builder tried to replicate the ore incinerator from MH but failed miserably. Processes ores at a consistent 2x
I think this was made by the same person who made the ore incinerator. Processes ores for 4x value.
This furnace processes ores at 20x their value but only works on ores that have not been upgraded.
This variant of the cell furnaces process unupgraded ores at 500x their value.
Using quantum power to process unupgraded ores at 4,000x their value.
Using the power of hexagons, this furnace processes ores at 6x their value.
The hot springs waterfall powers up ores to be processed at 10x value.
The techno melter dissolves ores for 15x their value.
The all powerful golden beam adds $10 to ores but only works 5 times.
This machine zaps your ores with lasers to double their value. Can only be used once.
A very neat upgrader. Upgrades ores by 1.4x until they reach $1K
A small device that lets you control the flow of your ores.
It's a door made of marble
A nice floorboard to decorate your base
This wall is here to help you keep anyone out!
This wall is here to help you keep anyone out!
A Piece Of Flooring Made From Wood
This wall is here to help you keep anyone out!
This wall is here to help you keep anyone out!
It's a door made of wood
This small conveyor can help fill in gaps in your conveyor belt systems
Cleans ores to add 50% value to them, only works once.
This item attempts to launch ores but with varying success.
This upgrader infuses ores with electricity, upgrading their value by 1.25x until they reach $50K
This small machine clips onto the side of a conveyor and can upgrade ores by 5% up to 20 times.
This small machine lowers your ores down and upgrades them by 30%, works 3 times.
Uses magma to upgrade your ores by 1.4x three times!
This scorching machine is much better than what you've been using before. Upgrades ores by 2.5x, only works once.
A small beam of pure heat, upgrades ores by 3x, only works once. Does not work on ores worth over $100B
These small spikes have burning power inside them. Does 1.5x. Works 3 times.
Accelerates protons in ores to give them a 3x upgrade if you can hit the beam, only works once.
The power of chrome crystals powers the upgrader, upgrades ores by 60% until they hit $5M
This version of the golden beam does random things to the ore. Nobody knows what's gonna happen.
Upgraded laser beams upgrade ores by 55% until they are worth $4B
The S-Bend moves ores around in a weird way and upgrades them by 70%, does not work on ores worth more than $60B
A larger ramp to reach even higher elevations
This version of the iron mine pumps out massive iron ores worth $5K but takes forever to drop them.
This machine pumps out giant gold ores worth $40K but takes a very long time to do so. Kinda like the Massive Iron Mine
A piece of ancient tech from the past. Triples ore value, only works once.
An ancient material given the name Ambrosia is useful for infusing Ambrosia into ores! Does 5x once!
1 of the 4 elements of the laser set, embodies the power of ice.
1 of the 4 elements of the laser set, embodies the power of nature.
1 of the 4 elements of the laser set, embodies the power of fire.
1 of the 4 elements of the laser set, embodies the power of lightning.
A simple yet effective upgrader. Does 3x
This mine drops massive chunks of diamond worth $250M
This item looks very similar to something. Does 4x, works once.
Sits at the side of conveyors and upgrades ores a limitless amount of times, most of the time.
This upgrader is blasting out fire from all around. Upgrades ores by 45% until they hit $800M.
This upgrader is powered by the crystals that ended up fused to it. Does 4x, works once.
This small city likes returning visitors, does 2.5x, works twice.
Crimsonite holds a small amount of evil power within it, does 2x to ores, works twice.
mm has handed down a powerful blessing in the form of a cell furnace. Gains more power from higher cash values
This mine produces valuable ores worth between $2.5M and $25M
The laser refiner's true power has been released. Does 3x
Red, Green and Blue. This upgrade harnesses the power of these 3 colours to upgrades ores by 4x once.
Similar to it's counterpart, the temple uses colours to upgrade ores by 4x once.
Using the power of all colours, this upgrader upgrades ores by 5x
A relic from the past. Grants you with the power of a demigod
This chilly mine drops ice ores worth $55M but these ores can't go up ramps.
This icy upgrader upgrades ores by 4x and has a chance to turn them into ice.
Amazing! These pillars are able to upgrade ores by 5x!
A mastery of machines, does 4x to ores once.
A mine carved to represent fear. Drops ores worth $75M!
This side beam upgrader determines your upgrade via dice roll. Can do anywhere between 1-6x
A massive machine that represents salt. Drops huge salt ores at the click of a button. Incompatible with cell furnaces.
This upgrader uses the power of a small star to upgrade ores by 3x
A set of gates that will make your ores feel Grand. Does 4x
A upgrader so evil that it just loves upgrading ores because it is actually slightly detroying them a bit when they go through the upgrader! Does 4x once!
This upgrader condenses 2 beams that each do 2x, each beam only works once.
A simple magma beam. Triples ore value once.
A very simple upgrader that uses toxins to triple ore value.
This item is powered by plasma, does 4x to ores.
The power of the void has been locked in place to power the void crystal, does 4x
This upgrader does 6x to ores that can actually reach it.
This device resets all the upgrade tags on ores allowing them to be used with use limit upgraders again.
A calm field in the middle of autumn, whoever turned this into an upgrader is insane.
A beastly machine from the depths of the underworld. Has an ever increasing ore value.
Upgrades ores depending on which upgrade beam they hit. Works once.
This scanner does a massive 7x upgrade to ores if you can hit the beam. Works once.
A modified drone that shoots a beam that can upgrade ores by 10x
The immense power of diamonds is raditating through the upgrader. Does 4x once.
The lava lands melts down ores for 50x their value
This item was once powerful enough to destroy all upgrade tags on an ore but now is just a mere upgrader. Does 5x once.
The freezing atmosphere of where this was obtained has turned this tunnel into a frozen beam. Does 4x once.
The original, the superior, this mine's ores are worth more than it's counterparts.
This is the green variant of the tower defense mine. Drops green ores.
This is the yellow variant of the tower defense mine. Drops yellow ores.
This is the blue variant of the tower defense mine. Drops blue ores.
This is the orange variant of the tower defense mine. Drops orange ores.
This is the violet variant of the tower defense mine. Drops violet ores.
The ruins of an abandoned factory, upgrades ores using the motion of the still operational gears.
A very unsafe passage that has toxic waste leaking onto it. Does 4x to ores, applies radiation.
The Big One will shock the setups with its large ores worth $200M.
Christmas only happens once per year but this upgrader is a constant reminder that it's always in our hearts.
The town lane provides a greater upgrade to lower value ore.
The ethereal cataclysm does massive changes to ores to upgrade them by 5.5x
A useful conveyor for upgraders that can't be reached for higher upgraders!
A nice simple nature furnace that processes ores at 85x their value.
Send the ores into the shuriken to upgrade it by 4x
A ring of crystals blesses your ores that go through it. Does 5x
The rocky upgrader infuses your ores with rocks to massively increase their value.
Uses the power of lasers to magnify ores by five times.
Mining all the time for that  x4 upgrade.
This uses redtronium a scarce intense mineral but using it has an issue it is random not always giving the best power leading to powerful yet random upgrades.
The redtonium mine is a simple mine that drops rare Redtonium that is worth some good money.
This powerful machine spews out ores very fast. Ores are worth $300M
The dark star does 5x to ores, can only be obtained during the dark hours.
The star shine is capable of doing a 5x upgrade. Can only be obtained while the sun is up.
The core of this machine has a laser shooting out the bottom of it, does 7x to ores.
The void collector hovers above your setup doing 3x to all ores that pass underneath it.
A cell furnace that distorts space time with a small black hole. Processes unupgraded ores at 5,555,555,555x
This upgrader does 4x to your ores and turns them neon
A weaker variant of the plasma recharger but still has a promising upgrade.
A blaster powered by a miniture version of the sun. Grants a heavy upgrade but will incinerate ore fast if not put out.
The undead shroom aids ores by wiping all effects from it and will even upgrade them by 4x for the first use.
This upgrader is said to haunt ores, does 6x but makes ores smoking.
The insides of a volcano has been poured onto a fireproof conveyor. Does 8x to ores but sets them on fire.
Muahaha! Even though it's too late for halloween, we still spook your ores.
The volcanic tower is able to upgrade ores from anywhere on your base.
A beam emitted from a saturn shaped object. Does 5x to ores.
Who created a mine out of a desk lamp? Drops ores worth $2.5B
A fancy satellite that beams down power to all ores that pass by.
The digital laser strikes down any ores that enter.
The rarity of such a burning power makes this item an anomaly
This special upgrader will boost the value of all ores that go through it by 400%
This upgrader upgrades ores by how high up it is.
Kyanite ores are very valuable, they are worth between $3B & $5B.
Any ore you send through the Gate of the Sun will be judged. It may becomes super powerful or could be incinerated.
The power of the void is too great and leaked into this upgrader. Does 6x
The true power of infinity can't ever be reached. This item is the cloest humanity has gotten.
A very weird mine that can be placed in the sky to drop ores down. Ores are worth $2.5B
WHO CAME UP WITH THIS NAME? Processes ores at 250x their value
A traditional city upgrader. Upgrades ores by 5x
Send your ore through the midday starshine for near endless upgrades. Caps at 1N
The oof hydra mine has 3 heads which each drop their own respective ore.
This crazy machine spins it's lasers like crazy to do a massive upgrade.
The forgotten shamrock puts the midday starshine to shame with its 1DD cap.
This dropper requires coal to drop ores. Ores are worth quite a bit.
A broken television found on a pile of rocks, use that with a furnace. Does anywhere between 200-600x
The dropper of death makes pure bloodstone ores worth $500B
An item with 2 uses, creates super powerful ores and triples ore value with the flamethrower.
A very powerful gate that does 8x but can only be obtained during the night.
A very powerful gate that does 8x but can only be obtained during the day.
This special mine's ores can absorb other ores into itself.
The clock tower harness the time of the real world to calculate its upgrade.
The most resistent ore that is immune to radiation, takes twice as long to burn from fire and is less likely to be destroyed by blasters.
The magma overloader is powered by pure magma. Does a 12x upgrade.
It's a tank. Do i need to say more?
This special mine's ores can absorb other ores into itself.
Does it really surprise anyone that this item can kill ores?
Do not question the future, it's up to the choices you make.
The almighty stellar blaze works better in the day where it is obtainable.
The almighty lunar haze works better at night where it is obtainable.
The natural springs uses all natural minerals to massively upgrade your ores.
The enchanted field uses it's magic to process ores at 25000x their value
This mine drops coal ores that are worth $0 but they can power machines
The angelic sprayer is a refiner that recieves bonus upgrades if used with the Angelic Light.
The heavens heard your cry. They sent down an angel to help. If used with the Angelic Sprayer, the ore will recieve a bonus upgrade.
The symbol of DD, does 10x to ores.
Obtaining tsTG must have been hard, does 70x, not compatible with the Overlord Execution.
The demons of the desert has left this interesting item behind. There is no reason why they did. Seems powerful.
A special banner to remember the past Ore Mania.
Just an average wet floor sign
Helps you get to around your setup.
Helps you get to around your setup.
This expertly crafted upgrader upgrades your ores by 20% per beam.
The flaming beams of the hydraulic forger each upgrade your ore by 30%
Similarly to the dualgrader, this upgrader upgrades ores by 20% per beam.
The powerful yet cheap zapper will upgrade your ores by 20% up to 3 times with no cash limit.
This upgrader heats up ores. Ores that are made of ice get melted. Normal ores get a nice upgrade but may get set on fire.
A normal sized platform that allows you to place an item on top of it.
The stars rebirth upgrades ores based on how skilled the owner is.
This upgrader was forged by zeus himself to award those who are patient and punish those who are impatient.
The powerful arch symbolizes power that can amass to something that humans can't comprehend.
The void amplifier modifies the antimatter of ores to give them a shield to protect them from blasters.
The vudeite spitter is the ultimate power. Has the power of many other ores along with it's own.
The eternal sound of a clock can always be heard from within this furnace. A curse of eternity.
The ultimate power gives all ores its blessing.
The giga extractor makes your ores immortal but the immense power crushes them in 3 seconds.
Accepts ores from blue teleporter senders
This item teleports your ores to blue senders but may malfunction.
This good ol' item boosts your speed and jump!
A calm field in the middle of autumn, whoever turned this into an upgrader is insane.
A calm field in the middle of autumn, whoever turned this into an upgrader is insane.
A calm field in the middle of autumn, whoever turned this into an upgrader is insane.
This item will cause the gravity of your ores to become normal again, most of the time.
This item causes ores to fall upwards.
The scarlet moon has created an anomaly known as the blood moon. Upgrades ores anywhere between 10x-40x
Unleash the underworldly energy to process ores at 6,666x
The holy shard will upgrade ores by 30x
Drops ores with heavenly aura that are worth $5qd
Processes normal ores at 4,000x but will process any holy ores at 10,000x
The angelic columns is a small upgrader that does 15x
The heaven's tree is rewarding but will lose power with every ore processed.
These large towers do a massive 35x upgrade to ores and may occasionally grant an additional 1.2x upgrade.
This refiner will increase your ores value by 50%
A holy passage which blesses your ores with a 25x upgrade.
An insanely powerful portal has pulled through a hellish side upgrader. Use it at your own risk.
A mine that looks like it's about to fly away.
Use this to make ores go places UPDSIDE DOWN!
This conveyor can center your upside down ores.
This special anti gravity device can upgrades ores by 80%
This special upgrader upgrades ores by 45% twice using it's 2 beams.
This upgrader upgrades ores by 3x after adding 1 million to their value.
This fancy device allows you to see an ore's value.
Accepts ores from green senders.
Accepts ores from orange senders.
Accepts ores from pink senders.
Sends ores to orange recievers if there is one available.
Sends ores to green recievers if it can find one.
This item will teleport your ore to a random available pink reciever
OOF! OOF! OOF! This upgrader QUADRUPLES the value of each ore! Can only be used once!
A curse from the devil, upgrades ores by 30x
This furnace processes ores based on how much they have been tainted  by upgraders.
This small device upgrades ores by 15x
This special gate can loop ores until they hit 6.66SxD
This small device will upgrade ores depending on how powerful they are.
What time is it in hell? Nobody knows, does 40x
Upgrades all ores unfortunate enough to hit it's beam by 27x
The ultimate formation of normal towers that were blessed and became heavenly. Each beam doubles ore value.
The machine can be used infinitely to provide random upgrades but could donate your ore to the gods.
This furnace was made by the gods to process ores and provide an upgrade.
A literal tree from hell, upgrades ores by 33x
A cube formed from the depths of the underworld. Emits a beam that does 25x to ores.
The heart of the devil can process lightly upgraded ores at insane rates.
Only those who are good enough can hope to lay eyes on the mystic lights. Does 30x
This item has been given a few modifications to make it actually decent. Drops special redtonium ores very quickly.
Thought desk lampinator was useless? Then prepare for the new and improved Desk Lampinator-9000. Brought to you by Lampinator Co.
These towers have condensed RGB energy inside them. Upgrades ores by 40x
Creates pure demonslight from coal. Ores are immune to fire.
The core of a sun, ignites any ore that dares come near it.
This large pile of rocks is somehow a self sustaining upgrader, does 55x
As if they weren't grand enough, now they are noble.
This item has way too much energy in it.
This furnace symbolizes how powerful nature truly can be if worked with correctly.
Like the undead shroom, this will clear all effects. Does 30x
Does the same thing as the dual passage but 5x the power.
The azure has blessed you before. Now it comes with its ultimate response.
This item is extremely poisonous. So poisonous that it's actually good but still applies radiation.
The ultimate crystal, the true blessing.
Magma has induced sparkles into this upgrader's conveyor.
The frosted gate is so condensed that it can't shed its ice onto ores.
It's a toned up frozen furnace. Has the ability to process ores at insane rates.
This mine spews laser ores at insane rates.
This items unholiness curses ores with smoking, radiation and fire.
The almight power of magnifying an ore's value in an upgrader form. Does 25x
The capital city of Rubble. Provides massive benefits to ores.
The leader of all satellites, some question whether it was possible to forge such a beast.
You've obtained something not ever meant to be obtained.
This small device cleans your ores and provide a 4x upgrade.
The shard spore seems to upgrade ores based on how many shards you currently have.
The aquatic temple has been recovered from the bottom of the ocean. This structure will do 35x to any ores and make them fireproof.
One of the most basic fusions, provides a huge upgrade with some radiation.
A very insane upgrader that loops ores very quickly until they hit 1DD
The almighty time rewinder is capale of rewinding ores to a past state while maintaining their present value.
The unreliable side of nature, will upgrade ores by a huge amount.
A freezingly cold enhancer which will turn ores to ice.
A completely cold starshine with no respect to ores. Upgrades until tdD.
A dark and haunted aura can be felt emitting from the core of the gate. It can be sensed that it can do great good or great evil.
This is what happens when you fuse 2 very powerful items. You get this.
You turned an upgrader into a mine. Why? Produces valuable ores.
Frost overload. Seems like the frozen wasteland has overpowered it.
A crystal shrine that seems to be more powerful at night for some unknown reason.
A weird item that seems to be missing a part, is currently unstable and occasionally steals an ore and massively upgrades it.
The ultimate ore is bread.
This upgrader will attempt to upgrade your ores using butter, seems to be more effective with bread.
Toast your ores with the almighty toaster. Works best with buttered bread.
A very weak cell furnace. Do not use this at all.
Freezes ores to remove fire from them
A small device created by the merchant himself, upgrades ores multiple times.
Created by the combined hatred of the roblox filter.
A small statue standing on a cloud. Can be raised into the sky.
Become huge and be able to jump much higher
This infuser makes you super small and fast.
This item will allow you to apply another infuser.
So much stored electrical current. Upgrades ores by 4x
A raised furnace powered by realistic statues of 4 different mms.
This upgrader has been hacked into the game by an expert infiltrator. Does 4x
This conveyor belt is fueled by uranium.
The power of the condiment speeds up the conveyor
The time reversal will trick cell furnaces into thinking that it isn't an upgrade.
A much more powerful version of the time reversal that can actually negate an upgrade.
The complexity of such a device can not be understood.
The mines are currently under construction and as such, you may end up in the void.
This item looks very similar to something. Does 4x, works once.
This device resets all the upgrade tags on ores allowing them to be used with use limit upgraders again.
Similar to it's counterpart, the temple uses colours to upgrade ores by 4x once.
Red, Green and Blue. This upgrade harnesses the power of these 3 colours to upgrades ores by 4x once.
A modified drone that shoots a beam that can upgrade ores by 10x
A cell furnace that distorts space time with a small black hole. Processes unupgraded ores at 5,555,555,555x
The void collector hovers above your setup doing 3x to all ores that pass underneath it.
These small spikes have burning power inside them. Does 1.5x. Works 3 times.
Upgrades ores depending on which upgrade beam they hit. Works once.
Does it really surprise anyone that this item can kill ores?
The volcanic tower is able to upgrade ores from anywhere on your base.
Kyanite ores are very valuable, they are worth between $3B & $5B.
A fancy satellite that beams down power to all ores that pass by.
This upgrader does 4x to your ores and turns them neon
This furnaces harnesses the power of the spectral to process ores at 2500x
This furnaces harnesses the power of the spectral to process ores at 2500x
Unleash the fury of dragons, this machine pumps out a form of dragite worth $50M
Absolute demonic dragon energy, creates ores worth $1Qn
The unknownigly powerful darkness absorbs power from all your items placed down.
The infernal alter prefers powerful ores and will process them at a higher rate.
This item upgrades the ores better if they are already super powerful.
Created from light, these ores have a special property where they are unable to have their value lowered by golden beams.
The strange properties of the blackhole modificator gives ores that go through it 5 shields.
The insane power output of combining the 4 laser droppers created this thing.
The neonic tower defender is what is made by fusing all the tower defense mines together.
The magical blessing took the furnace power from mm's blessing and the upgrade from the magical forest and combined them together.
The magical forest frequently sends out a pulse that doubles the ore value of any ore close to it. Processes unupgraded ore at x750,000,000,000
A relic from the past, drops valuable VIPium worth $1K
A relic from the past. Processes ores at 10x value.
A relic from the past. The power of the OM overlords does 3x to your ores.
A relic from the past. Upgrades your speed and jump by a significant amount.
A special tracker infused with the blood of the fallen. A worthy device for such overlords.
A relic from the past.
A relic from the past
A relic from the past
A relic from the past
This statue is awarded to the many submitters of OMR.
A special furnace for submitters, does 40x
This weird spire creates ores within it which then come down the ramp.
The local lighthouse decided to get involved in your money making scheme by making an upgrade section.
The untold myth of the kraken that originated from the void has been molded into a furnace which draws power from items on your base.
This handy upgrader upgrades your ores multiple times.
The ultimate looping device. Loops ores until they hit 1TGN.
This item harvests the power of the digital system to upgrade ores by a huge amount.
A being formed from the existence of heavenly items, gains power if the ore has been upgraded by angelic sprayer and angelic light.
This item is formed from crystals, processes ores based on how much MC you have.
A relic from the past. Drops an ore filled with the power of a demigod
A relic from the past. An upgrader worthy of the demigods
A relic from the past. A furnace with demigod levels of power.
This freezing furnace favours ice and fire ores. Does 6x to normal ores, 12x to ice ores, 15x to ores on fire and 25x to ice ores on fire.
A relic from the past
A relic from the past
A relic from the past. A very spooky upgrader that will spooky your ores.
A relic from the past. A spooky infuser that only grants a jump boost
A relic from the past. A special tracker infused with godly energy.
The stars have been generous. Upgrades ores by 8x
A small skull blaster that can be used to increase ore value up to 3 times. Don't ask where we found the skull.
The ultimate infuser, grants insane boosts.
Just a boring old upgrader. Does 3x
The sun is starting to appear for longer. The start of spring is here.
A creation of ev.. i mean the darkmatter elementalist. It has some high ore value.
A mine that has 4 spouts that create small ores worth $750K
A frozen masterpiece that upgrades ores by 30x
Some strange mushrooms, this upgrader seems to do 7x
A spooky furnace found from the most basic of cases. Processes ores at 200x
Now a part of the spooky pack from the past. This conveyor moves ores at ghostly speeds.
The frozen statue floats by your setup and upgrades ores by 4x
You defeated the robotic EGG-9000 and got a small replica of it that does 10x
This helpful noob shoots a laser onto your conveyor that does 3x
The volcano is erupting its goods all over the conveyor. Does 5x but sets the ore on fire.
How does a shark even end up in sand? Does 4x
A long lane of cacti has been turned into an upgrader. Why is everything an upgrader these days? Does 4.5x
The dark power of the void, does 10x and makes ores as dark as the void.
Pixelated waterfall? How is that possible? Does 3.5x
WOW! Old alien ruins? Does 7x
The station in the sky managed by hot air balloons, does 5x
Crystalised fungus? It seems to radiate intense energy capable of upgrading your ores by 4x
Enriches your ores with the flavour of strawberries, does 3x
Infuses ores with amber crystal fragments to increase their value by 5x
An upgrader on some clouds? How does that work? Does 5x
A lake with an upgrader under it that does 11x
Shocks ores with the fused curcuits due to the rain. Does 5x
Why do humans try to manipulate the void, it'll never work. Does 7x
A little item to thank the testers who helped us test Ore Mania Redux.
The digital core will process ores better if they have a digital tag on them.
The boat looks like it's being attacked by a terror from the deep. Processed ores will go towards repairs.
A large pillar of obsidian that seems to spawn ores on top of it that topple downwards.
Multiple powerful cores power the hexagonal structure of the central, does 4x
The clam retrieved from the bottom of the sea has a powerful pearl within that does 4x to nearby ores
The black hole will suck ores into it and keep hold of them for a couple seconds before dropping them. Does 15x
Having this small item placed down seems to connect itself to ores wirelessly. Boosts ore's effectiveness with upgraders, effect diminishes with multiple ores.
The almighty venom blast does 6x to nearby ores but poisons them, causing them to lose some value over time.
